about_the_game:
Bow-Bots is the ultimate VR multiplayer shooter that thrusts you into the metallic shoes of a formidable bow-wielding robot. Prepare for intense battles in a dynamic arena where strategy and skill are your keys to victory.

Better Aim, Bigger Rewards:


Bow-Bots presents a distinctive item system that sets it apart from the competition. As you traverse the battlefield, take aim and fire at strategically placed targets to acquire a diverse range of powerful arrows. Whether it's explosive, EMP, or Sniper Arrows, each has its unique role in shaping the outcome of the battle. Strive for the elusive golden bullseye to unlock Tier 2 arrows, granting you a decisive advantage on the battlefield.

Manage Your Shields Wisely:


In the heat of battle, your robotic shields are under constant assault. To maintain your protective barrier, target the shield bots traveling across the map. Don't fret, these shield bots are generally harmless – but keep your sensors sharp, as they can get mischievous. Keep a vigilant eye out for the golden shield bots, which bestow double the shield replenishment, providing a lifeline when you need it most.

Seize the Power-Ups:

Turn the tide of battle with an arsenal of game-changing power-ups. Soar through the sky with the exhilarating jet pack, gain a burst of speed with the adrenaline-pumping speed boost, or bolster your defenses with the formidable Bow Shield. Adapt your strategy on the fly to exploit these power-ups and keep your opponents on their mechanical toes.

Multiplayer Mayhem:

Team up with friends for epic 3v3 battles that will test your cooperation and tactical skills, or dive into the chaotic frenzy of 6-player free-for-all. Bow-Bots offers a fast-paced, action-packed experience where every arrow and power-up matters. Forge alliances, plan ambushes, and engage in intense shootouts in a VR world unlike any other.

Bow-Bots - Where Strategy Meets Mayhem:


Are you ready to become the ultimate bow-wielding robot? Bow-Bots challenges you to master your unique item system, shield management, and power-ups to dominate the battlefield. Engage in thrilling multiplayer warfare where every choice counts, and where you and your robotic allies must work together to emerge victorious. Strap on your VR headset, grab your bow, and join the mayhem in Bow-Bots!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 3 Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus PC, or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Six Core 4 Ghz +
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

short_description: Bow-Bots is a VR Multiplayer Bow and Arrow Shooter with a unique item system. Shoot targets to gain powerful arrows or recharge your shields. The better your aim the better the reward.
